chapters.title: Chapter 50: Choosing Enemies
chapters.info: Lady Naean Arawn, p. 739—Slim, palely beautiful Andoran noble with big, blue eyes and waves of black hair. She sneers a lot. She opposed Morgase during the Succession. Dyelin exiled her from Caemlyn, as Morgase did long ago, for attempting to take the Lion Throne. She still planned to take it from Elayne, though once she was rescued from Murandy by Arymilla's men, her claim vanished. Her House then supported Arymilla for the Lion Throne and the Rose Crown of Andor. After Arymilla's attempt to take the Throne failed, Elayne imprisoned her, though she seemed broken before she was imprisoned. See also Marne, Arymilla; Sarand, Elenia.
